languages.text: "Ага. Ковш мотнуло при работе и вжух! Сизый без головы! Хороший был парень. А теперь нету его вот..."
"Yeah. The bucket just swung round and — bam! Smokey's head flew right off! He was a good fella. And now he's gone..."
languages.original_text: "Ага. Ковш мотнуло при работе и вжух! Сизый без головы! Хороший был парень. А теперь нету его вот..."

traits.locale_text: "Yeah. The bucket just swung mid-work and — bam! Smokey's head flew right off! He was a good fella. And now he's gone..."
"Yeah. The bucket just swung mid-work and — bam! Smokey's head flew right off! He was a good fella. And now he's gone..."
"Yeah. The bucket just swung round and — bam! Smokey's head flew right off! He was a good fella. And now he's gone..."
"Yeah. The bucket just swung round and — bam! Smokey's head flew right off! He was a good fella. And now he's gone..."
"Yeah. The bucket just swung round and — bam! Smokey's head flew right off! He was a good fella. And now he's gone..."

languages.text: “是啊，那个车斗突然转了一圈，然后，砰！斯莫奇的脑袋就飞出去了！他是个好家伙，现在他不在了……”
languages.original_text: "Yeah. The bucket just swung round and — bam! Smokey's head flew right off! He was a good fella. And now he's gone..."

traits.locale_text: “是啊，那个车斗突然转了一圈，然后，砰！斯莫奇的脑袋就飞出去了！他是个好家伙，现在他不在了……”

languages.text: «Sí. La máquina empezó a dar vueltas y... ¡bam! La cabeza de Humo salió volando. Era un buen tipo. Y se ha marchado...».
languages.original_text: "Yeah. The bucket just swung round and — bam! Smokey's head flew right off! He was a good fella. And now he's gone..."

traits.locale_text: «Sí. La máquina empezó a dar vueltas y... ¡bam! La cabeza de Humo salió volando. Era un buen tipo. Y se ha marchado...».

languages.text: 「あぁ。シャベルがぐるんと回って…バン！スモーキーの頭は一瞬で空に吹っ飛んだ。良い奴だったよ。もうこの世にはいないがな…」
languages.original_text: "Yeah. The bucket just swung round and — bam! Smokey's head flew right off! He was a good fella. And now he's gone..."

traits.locale_text: 「あぁ。シャベルがぐるんと回って…バン！スモーキーの頭は一瞬で空に吹っ飛んだ。良い奴だったよ。もうこの世にはいないがな…」

languages.text: "Ja. Die Schaufel drehte sich und – zack! Und dann flog Smokeys Kopf durch die Gegend. Er war ein guter Kerl. Und jetzt ist er fort ..."
languages.original_text: "Yeah. The bucket just swung round and — bam! Smokey's head flew right off! He was a good fella. And now he's gone..."

traits.locale_text: "Ja. Die Schaufel drehte sich und – zack! Und dann flog Smokeys Kopf durch die Gegend. Er war ein guter Kerl. Und jetzt ist er fort ..."

languages.text: « Ouais. Le seau s'est balancé en tournant, et puis PAF ! La tête de Smokey a volé ! C'était un brave gars. Et maintenant, il est mort... »
languages.original_text: "Yeah. The bucket just swung round and — bam! Smokey's head flew right off! He was a good fella. And now he's gone..."

traits.locale_text: « Ouais. Le seau s'est balancé en tournant, et puis PAF ! La tête de Smokey a volé ! C'était un brave gars. Et maintenant, il est mort... »

languages.text: "Evet... Kova sallandı, sallandı ve bam! Smokey'nin kafası uçtu gitti! İyi bir çocuktu ama rahmetli oldu."
languages.original_text: "Yeah. The bucket just swung round and — bam! Smokey's head flew right off! He was a good fella. And now he's gone..."

traits.locale_text: "Evet, kova sallandı, sallandı ve bam! Smokey'in kafası direkt uçtu! İyi bir çocuktu ama yok artık."
